summary: A suite of lightweight Ansible modules that serve as test fixtures for the ansible-doc integration test suite, each exposing different combinations of documentation metadata, examples, return specifications, and status flags to exercise the documentation parsing and rendering logic.
business_intent: Validate that the ansible-doc command correctly processes module documentation across a range of scenarios, including missing fields, removed or nonâ€‘iterable status, nested suboptions, YAML anchors, and malformed return definitions, thereby ensuring robust documentation handling in Ansible.
